meanings.definition: A person who jumps from an aircraft using a parachute.
meanings.sent1: The parachutists gracefully floated down from the sky.
meanings.sent2: Many parachutists enjoy the thrill of skydiving.
meanings.sent3: The parachutists landed in a field of colorful flowers, creating a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent4: Like colorful petals in the wind, the parachutists descended from above.
meanings.sent5: The parachutists' descent was as gentle as a feather drifting to the ground.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the activity of parachuting.
meanings.sent1: We watched the parachutists jump out of the plane with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The group of parachutists gathered to discuss their next skydiving adventure.
meanings.sent3: The parachutists joked about having 'skydiving competitions' to see who could land first.
meanings.sent4: In the world of adventure, the parachutists were the fearless pioneers of the sky.
meanings.sent5: The parachutists' camaraderie was as strong as the nylon cords of their parachutes.
